notes: Runs fine, but the mouse is sometimes not controllable and the camera is moving weird.

title: Dead Effect
notes: work very well ,you will need lower mouse sensibility in game options.

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.27.0, 4.19.0-041900rc5-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: Game runs fine except for that the controls and camera are a bit off. You have to reduce mouse acceleration and camera sensitivity, but that is a flaw of the game and no different to playing it natively. However the camera keeps pulling down ever so slightly when walking forward, this does not occur when playing on native.
